devdoc.details: Supports:            1) Tracking MIMO Locked up            2) Decaying voting weight lookup            3) Closure of contract

balanceOf(address).details: Gets the user's votingWeight at the current time.

params._owner: User for which to return the votingWeight

balanceOfAt(address,uint256).details: Gets a users votingWeight at a given block timestamp

params._blockTime: Timestamp for which to calculate balance. Can not be in the past
params._owner: User for which to return the balance

params._unlockTime: Time at which the stake should unlock
params._value: Total units of StakingToken to lockup

expireContract().details: Ends the contract, unlocking all stakes. No more staking can happen. Only withdraw.

increaseLockAmount(uint256).details: Increases amount of stake thats locked up & resets decay

params._value: Additional units of StakingToken to add to exiting stake

increaseLockLength(uint256).details: Increases length of lockup & resets decay

withdraw().details: Withdraws all the senders stake, providing lockup is over

devdoc.title: VotingEscrow

userdoc.notice: Lockup GOV, receive vGOV (voting weight that decays over time)
